title: 80s fonts
content:
Hi, can someone tell me the name of these faces?

Much appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120306211836im_/http:/typophile.com/files/edbanger_4181.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120306211836im_/http:/typophile.com/files/storytelling_4814.png)
author: kernface

comments.content: I am in the midst of identifying all the fonts used in this video and it will be up on [Typographica](http://web.archive.org/web/20120306211836/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typographica) soon.
